mapper.sql: id, uuid, name, id_no, remark, is_del, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into citizen (id, uuid, name, id_no, remark, is_del, create_date, update_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

( #{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

id,

mapper.update:
update citizen
uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id_no = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update citizen set uuid = #{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_no = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM citizen
AND name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND id_no like concat('%', #{idNo})
